body: Who's the last girl for a study
@Shameless Nameless Actually, no, we can't use it in 2019 because it is not a leap year and 2008 was a leap year :(

After a quick Google, I've discovered this calendar was accurate from July 2018 - June 2019 as mentioned, but also will be accurate once again from July 2029 - June 2030. Worth the wait? and FWIW I find it more disturbing not that this exists and not that Nunnally is in it (like honestly she needs protecction more than anyone else in the series IMHO) but that it was not only TRANSLATED but also DECENSORED. What kind of person even bothered? Not that the art is bad, it's very good. I wonder also if there's someone out there who lives/lived alone and used it.
nc zombie,u do u,im gonna fp in 2017 evry day
I'd do it IDGAF what anyone thinks

I'm gonna print this, make a time machine and go back to 1st Jan 2007 and fap everyday to mark each day by shooting my white liquid on the calendar.
It will be the greatest achievement humanity had ever achieved since the beginning of time.
You know, you could actually use this calendar later at 2019 since in that year, 1st January is also at tuesday
Yea um, i cant put this on my fridge.
Holy shit. Ishikei. You seriously expected someone to use this as a calendar in real life? Jesus Crust.
